sources.title: Holt of the Secret Service (1941) 15-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Jack Holt, Evelyn Brent, Montague Shaw
Director: James W. Horne

An action-packed Cliffhanger from Columbia Pictures. A murderous gang of counterfeiters kidnaps the US government's chief engraver. They stash him in an abandoned mine and force him to print virtually undetectable phony money. The Secret Service sends its toughest agents, played by veteran screen actors Jack Holt and Evelyn Brent, to infiltrate the crime ring and undercover its mastermind.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:27       CHAPTER 1: Chaotic Creek
29:00     CHAPTER 1: Ramparts of Revenge
48:52     CHAPTER 1: Illicit Wealth
1:07:22  CHAPTER 1: Menaced by Fate
1:25:47  CHAPTER 1: Exits to Terror
1:43:29  CHAPTER 1: Deadly Doom
2:00:58  CHAPTER 1: Out of the Past
2:17:52  CHAPTER 1: Escape to Peril 
2:35:22  CHAPTER 1: Sealed in Silence 
2:51:48  CHAPTER 1: Named to Die 
3:09:52  CHAPTER 1: Ominous Warnings 
3:27:50  CHAPTER 1: The Stolen Signal  
3:45:11  CHAPTER 1: Prison of Jeopardy
4:03:10  CHAPTER 1: Afire Afloat
4:21:27  CHAPTER 1: Yielded Hostage
4:40:34 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: A murderous gang of counterfeiters has kidnapped the government's best engraver and is forcing him to print virtually undetectable phony money. The Secret Service sends its toughest agent, Jack Holt, and a female partner after the gang.
metadata.Writer: Basil Dickey, George H. Plympton, Wyndham Gittens
metadata.Actors: Jack Holt, Evelyn Brent, C. Montague Shaw
